message: If you haven't seen www.zapon.com yet check it out and get your Valley rank to know how well connected you are within the Bay Area. But this is only the first step, or perhaps no step at all, for a greater thing to come in a couple weeks. Believe us when we say it will be mobile, realtime and interesting :)
@sstave you think many people avoid it because of the FB sign-in?
@sczon You should probably consider providing alternate means of signing up. I also avoid connecting apps to my facebook account. I can't tell if it's a prevalent concern though.
@micrypt in the App you have the option, for the Teaser we wanted it to be as easy as possible.

But we have launched our Private BETA, http://bit.ly/hN4Nzu just join us. With zapon you can communicate in real-time with other people, all based on your favorite Interests. The Interest Graph revolution has begun.
